name: tgs-crew-creator
description: The Crew Creator Application for the Takapuna Grammar School Rowing Club

scripts.unix: npm run unix:init; npm run unix:fe:build; npm run unix:dev
scripts.unix:fe:build: cd ./public; npm i; npm run build
scripts.unix:init: npm i; cd public; npm i ;cd ..; npm run unix:init:db
scripts.unix:init:db: npm run unix:init:drop-db; cd ./util; rm -rf ./.tmp; echo "setting up db"; echo "compiling"; tsc ./initSchema.ts --outDir ./.tmp --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata;echo "running"; node ./.tmp/util/initSchema.js; rm -rf ./.tmp
scripts.unix:init:drop-db-old: mysql -u root -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS HUDSON_CURREN_TGS_CREW_CREATOR;"
scripts.unix:serve: cd ./public; npm run build; cd ..; npm run unix:dev;
scripts.win: DOSKEY clear=cls && npm run win:init && npm run win:fe:build && npm run win:dev
scripts.win:fe:build: cd public && npm i && npm run win:build
scripts.win:init: npm i && cd public && npm i && cd .. && npm run win:init:db
scripts.win:init:db: npm run win:init:drop-db && cd util && echo "Setting Up DB" && echo "COMPILING" && tsc initSchema.ts --outDir .tmp --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata && echo "running" && node .tmp\util\initSchema.js
scripts.win:serve: cd .\public; npm run build; cd ..; npm run win:dev;

author: Hudson Curren <hudson.curren@icloud.com>
